longBusinessSummary: ACME Lithium Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of natural resource properties in the United States and Canada. It holds 100% interest in the FLV claim group comprising 207 mineral claims covering an area of approximately 4,139 acres located in Esmeralda County, Nevada; and the Shatford Lake project comprising 21 claims covering an area of approximately 8,883 acres, as well as the Birse property 10 claims totaling 5,196 acres located in southeastern Manitoba, Canada. The also has an option to acquire 100% interests in the Cat-Euclid Lake project that consists of 6 claims totaling approximately 2,930 acres located in southeastern Manitoba, Canada; and the Clayton Valley project comprising 58 claims totaling 1,160 acres located in Clayton Valley, Esmeralda County, Nevada. ACME Lithium Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Stephen G. Hanson CMA, CPA
